article_title: APEE Conference Highlights How Individual Decisions Shape the Economy
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

article_metadata.description: The 40th annual APEE conference featured an exchange about how individual decisions are made, both in the economy and in the government that regulates it.
